ygData.subject: Re: Flarfian auctions, I'll bring the enchant silver spell to you for a little cash or magic item trade...
ygData.msgSnippet: Let me see if I understand this... You can only get the enchant silver spell in Nektolus or Neriak? Zahlhedren-Karana- ... From: Shawn Alley
ygData.messageBody:
Let me see if I understand this...

You can only get the enchant silver spell in Nektolus or Neriak?

Zahlhedren-Karana-


-----Original Message-----
From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com' <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 2:46 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Flarfian auctions, I'll bring the enchant silver
spell to you for a little cash or magic item trade...


>From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
>
>Are you an enchanter?
>Are you ready to begin enchanting metal?
>Do you look longingly at Nektolus or Neriak and feel the need to attempt
>to enter but are afraid?
>Wish someone could help you out?
>
>I, Flarfian, a dark elf necromancer would like to help out. For a fee
>to cover time/expense I will bring an enchant silver scroll to you
>(payment upon delivery) in the Freeport/Commons areas. If I can make a
>bit on each scroll I will be able to stockpile a large number of them.
>Also, remember you will need the more exotic enchant metal scrolls at
>some point and these are EXPENSIVE for me to buy so I need a pool of
>working capitol. My purchase price to buy enchant silver is 4p6g just
>so you know it's not too cheap. Make an offer over that and we'll see
>if we can make a deal! Act now, our enchant metal counselors are
>standing by, free alchoholic beverage or edible goo with any purchase.
>
>Feel free to email me:
>shawna@... - work
>alleys@... - home
>
>with your offer and where/when you would like to meet. I'm often
>playing other characters so it may be difficult to /tell me directly in
>game.
>
>All on Povar:
>Flarfian, level 9 dark elf necromancer, Neriak
>Flarfianb, level 4 human paladin, Freeport
>Flarfianc, level 8 barbarian warrior, Halas
>Azara, level 6 enchanter, Freeport
>Owee, level 4 dwarf cleric, G Feydark
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Did you know that knowledge is power?
>http://www.ONElist.com
>Join a new ONElist e-mail community and strengthen your mind!
>
